step.text: <html>Starting with the detail of the plasma membrane and the binding of the LDL particle to the LDL receptor, the animation will not focus on the process of endocytosis. To bring all of the players to the same scale we will successively zoom in from the plasma membrane with the full lipid bilayer illustrated to simplified symbols for each of the components. </red> </html>
